sn52.7:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn52.7:1.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato anuruddhassa paccassosuṁ.
sn52.7:2.1: “Cattārome, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṁvattanti.
sn52.7:2.6: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
sn52.7:2.7: ime kho, āvuso, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṁvattantī”ti.
